title: Home
text:
Sayuri Pamoda Ponnamperuma
  

  
    Welcome! I'm an enthusiastic undergraduate in Statistics with a deep curiosity for data and its stories. From forecasting and modeling to uncovering patterns through visualization, I enjoy transforming complex questions into meaningful insights. Thank you for visiting.

title: About Me
text:
I‚Äôm a dedicated final-year Statistics Honors undergraduate at the University of Sri Jayewardenepura, driven by a deep interest in data and its applications across disciplines. I‚Äôm currently engaged in Statistical Consultancy and working on my undergraduate thesis under the supervision of Dr.Thiyanga Talagala




üïµÔ∏è Research Interests

Time Series Analysis & Forecasting

Computational Statistics

Machine Learning

Anomaly Detection

Functional Data Analysis
Spatio-Temporal Data Analysis
Statistical Inference

title: About Me
text:
Dengue Pattern Analysis

Description: Analyzed dengue patterns in Sri Lanka and Brazil using advanced analytics and machine learning.
Skills Used: Data analysis, machine learning, R, Python
Highlights:

Explored spatio-temporal trends in dengue outbreaks.
Applied predictive modeling to forecast dengue cases.

title: Sayuri Pamoda Ponnamperuma
text:
COVID-19 Pandemic in Russia (Individual ‚Äì 2024)
In this project, I analyzed time series data on confirmed cases, deaths, recoveries, and active COVID-19 cases in Russia using R. For data visualization, I used the ggplot2 package to create insightful plots that highlight trends and patterns throughout the pandemic.

text:
Prefect (2009 ‚Äì 2016), Deputy Head Prefect (2017), Head Prefect (2018‚Äì2019):

title: Sayuri Pamoda Ponnamperuma
text:
COVID-19 Pandemic in Russia (Individual ‚Äì 2024)
In this project, I analyzed time series data on confirmed cases, deaths, recoveries, and active COVID-19 cases in Russia using R. For data visualization, I used the ggplot2 package to create insightful plots that highlight trends and patterns throughout the pandemic.
